item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, September 11, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Holy smokes, I just released a MiniGolf game for Palm OS in 2024 (49 points | 6 comments)
2. We spent $20 to achieve RCE and accidentally became the admins of .mobi (1030 points | 246 comments)
3. Noisy Neighbor Detection with eBPF (75 points | 22 comments)
4. Scientists use magnetic nanotech to safely rewarm frozen tissues for transplant (118 points | 25 comments)
5. SQLite on Rails: The how and why of optimal performance (113 points | 17 comments)
6. PathPilot (YC S24) Is Hiring a Founding AI and Full-Stack Engineer ( | hide)
7. Algorithmic Wage Discrimination (107 points | 48 comments)
8. AppleWatchAmmeter (201 points | 33 comments)
9. Transparenttextures.com (52 points | 6 comments)
10. Show HN: Tune LLaMa3.1 on Google Cloud TPUs (57 points | 13 comments)
11. Max Headroom and the World of Pseudo-CGI (2013) (113 points | 52 comments)
12. The Big Baltic Bomb Cleanup (14 points | 1 comment)
13. The Golden Road: How Ancient India Transformed the World (104 points | 28 comments)
14. The first release candidate of FreeCAD 1.0 is out (19 points | 2 comments)
15. David Chang on the long, hard, stupid way (120 points | 87 comments)
16. The magic of DC-DC voltage conversion (2023) (338 points | 102 comments)
17. Mistral releases Pixtral 12B, its first multimodal model (24 points | 3 comments)
18. Show HN: HypergraphZ – A Hypergraph Implementation in Zig (36 points | 6 comments)
19. OpenSSH Keystroke Obfuscation Bypass (117 points | 12 comments)
20. Passive damping – Bathroom scales (13 points | discuss)
21. Possibly all the ways to get loop-finding in graphs wrong (181 points | 39 comments)
22. Soft cells and the geometry of seashells (26 points | 1 comment)
23. Consent-O-Matic – automatically fills ubiquitous pop-ups with your preferences (270 points | 118 comments)
24. Fman Build System (22 points | 5 comments)
25. How economical is your local Taco Bell? (255 points | 272 comments)
26. Openly Licensed Streetview with Panoramax (65 points | 20 comments)
27. Some of us like "interdiff" code review (214 points | 156 comments)
28. Breaking Bell's Inequality with Monte Carlo Simulations in Python (91 points | 33 comments)
29. Show HN: Clace – Application Server with support for scaling down to zero (46 points | 13 comments)
30. Ask HN: Why is Pave legal? (855 points | 356 comments)
